cover.secondAutoText: For my love of Cinema and Literature

timeLine.title: Formation TypeScript, Projects
timeLine.content: After my experience at Solotech, I needed to reinforce my knowledge in TypeScript, which is why I am still training today in addition to doing several projects that you will find on this site.

timeLine.title: Solotech - Montreal
timeLine.content: Freelance Mission - In full remote with a Canadian Client in a project with Vue/Node/Typescript/GraphQL/AWS

timeLine.title: Joinery Business Solution - Nantes
timeLine.content: CDI - A Saas application for a carpentry Society with React/Node/React/Node/Express/Mongo/AWS.

timeLine.title: Projects / Job seeking
timeLine.content: Following the O'Clock training, I created several projects to strengthen my skills developed during the last 6 months, before being recruited by my first professional experience.

timeLine.title: O'Clock
timeLine.content: Training of 6 months in order to have a minimum of competences in the development Web and Web Mobile, with us to carry this offavoi.

timeLine.title: Jobs
timeLine.content: Different trades approached in this period of professional transition while waiting for the training of Developer, other strings to my bow in order to rise in competences in different domain and to forge my professional capacities in trades like waiter, barman, btp etc.

timeLine.title: WHV New Zealand
timeLine.content: Great adventure of a year of travel and discovery of many different trades, arrived with little in pocket I returned to France with a mastery of English, a choice of professional career mapped out and a multitude of diverse skills in the workplace, barman, waiter, construction, delivery, painter, winemaker, washer, cook.

timeLine.title: Bachelor degree in Aesthetic of cinema
timeLine.content: I studied aesthetics of cinema in Metz, which gave me a passion for animation, directing, writing, and a certain critical mind on what is done, a hindsight on my opinions and an irrepressible desire to realize my own cinematographic projects!

timeLine.title: Bac
timeLine.content: Studying architecture will awaken in me the desire to carry out large-scale projects, to understand that all achievements need a solid foundation.

projects.title: Covid-Tracker
projects.description: Small project in React, with some libraries for the map (Leaflet) and the graph (Graph.js). The application was made at the beginning of the Covid, the statistics have gradually exploded which makes that today the bubbles indicating the quantity by country of cases are huge not report the map. However the application remains functional.

projects.title: Netflix-Clone
projects.description: Simple HTML/CSS integration project via React with the use of the 'movie-trailer' api in order to get the trailers of each movie, and movieDB for the movie list. All hosted via Firebase.

projects.title: Spotify-Clone
projects.description: Simple HTML/CSS integration project using React and the Spotify api to retrieve data about the connected user.

projects.title: Sharing-Moments
projects.stacks: React - Node - Express - MongoDB - Redux - MaterialUI
projects.description: First fullstack project with a MERN stack, connection, message sharing, with the possibility to comment the shared message to all users, also to like the interactions, all these data stored on a MongoDB cluster and consequently creation of a CRUD in back.

projects.title: Crypto-App
projects.description: Light cryptocurrency exchange application via Metamask, with the creation of a smart_contract and integration of some tests via Chai.

projects.title: Chat-App
projects.description: Live communication project, creation of topics, live categories.

oclock.title: O'Clock
oclock.description1: Professional title Web and Mobile Web Developer - Niveau III
oclock.description2: Web development, integration, programming, Javascript, HTML, React, Node, Express, REST API, MYSQL.
oclock.description3: The 6-month training (840h), also labeled 'Grande École du Numérique'.
oclock.learnContent: Discover the logic of computer development. This training serves as a springboard for learning the essential web technologies for anyone who has ambitions for a future career in technology.
oclock.buildContent: Beyond the learning of web tools and languages, the Socle training allows you to address the issues of project management: analysis of the need, design of specifications, development of user stories, or the implementation of an agile work environment.
oclock.devContent: One can want to learn to make bread without necessarily wanting to become a baker. The training has also been designed for those who want to acquire the technical skills necessary to develop their entrepreneurial project.

chapter.title: Chapter 1 - Formation
chapter.content1: After my WHV in New-Zealand, I decided to train in a more intelectual job where I could put my energy in schematizing applications/software.
chapter.content2: Gain skills in a field that would allow me to put my ideas, create web projects, games, services and other useful tools (or not) in everyday life.
chapter.content3: That's why I'm starting my full time training to become a Web Developer in 2020.

chapter.title: Chapter 2 - The Begining
chapter.content1: Finally, after 6 months of self-training and various projects, I was spotted by a startup in Nantes. The only drawback was that there were only 2 developers coming out of the bootcamp.
chapter.content2: Challenge by the constitution of this startup, we have a big project to produce, an overflowing motivation it will thus be a question of putting all our efforts in a common goal without counting our hours.
chapter.content3: To put to good use our assiduously acquired skills and to constantly seek to improve them by putting a real point of interest on the hindsight of our decisions and code.

experience.title: Joinery Business Solution
experience.lieu: Nantes, Pays de la Loire, France
experience.content: Projet SaaS - une partie Menuiserie où Janneau menuiserie peut cataloguer ses produits et définir/configurer les problèmes métiers de chacune de leurs menuiseries. Une seconde partie Artisan où le Client/Artisan va pouvoir créer son Devis et recevoir sa menuiserie en chantier ou chez un particulier.
creation: Participation/Animation cérémonies Agile
Analyse des besoins techniques
Propositions de choix techniques/Architecture
Audit Technique et édition de documentation
Chiffrage/Estimations des difficultés techniques de développements
Relecture et contrôle de la qualité de code du second développeur
Prise en charge de la passation de connaissances pour mon remplaçant
Intégration HTML/CSS
Développement de Modules côté Menuiserie pour les difficultés métiers de chaque typo de produit:
Module de calcul de Surfaces
Module de calcul de Contraintes
Module de calcul de Limites dimensionnelles
Module de calcul Descente de charges
Module de calcul de Prix
Module de Schéma 2D ( dessiné lors de la sélection du Client/Artisan afin de prévisualiser sa commande)
javascript: Génération d'XML via JSON enregistré dans un FTP pour la réception de Janneau Menuiserie et l'interprétation de leurs ERP
